result.eng: Can I can drop in to you in the afternoon?
result.ga: An féidir liom bualadh isteach chugat tráthnóna
result.orig: An féidir liom bualadh isteach chugat tráthnóna
result.html: An féidir liom bualadh isteach chugat tráthnónaCan I can drop in to you in the afternoon?
result.ponchtml: An féidir liom bualaḋ isteaċ ċugat tráṫnónaCan I can drop in to you in the afternoon?

result.eng: Give me a drop of water please.
result.ga: Tabhair dom braon uisce le do thoil
result.orig: Tabhair dom braon uisce le do thoil
result.html: Tabhair dom braon uisce le do thoilGive me a drop of water please.
result.ponchtml: Taḃair dom braon uisce le do ṫoilGive me a drop of water please.

result.eng: Don't taste a single drop of that damned beer as long as you live.
result.ga: Ná blais aon deor den bheoir mhallaithe le do lá
result.orig: Ná blais aon deor den bheoir mhallaithe le do lá

result.ponchtml: Ná blais aon deor den ḃeoir ṁallaiṫe le do láDon't taste a single drop of that damned beer as long as you live.
